casebody.data:
Catawba County, by and through its Child Support Agency, ex rel. Shawna Rackley
v.
Jason Loggins No. 152PA16 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 22, 2016 J. David Abernethy, Attorney at Law, for Catawba County (by and through its Child Support Agency), et al. Blair E. Cody, III, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Loggins, Jason. David W. Hood, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Catawba County (by and through its Child Support Agency). John F. Maddrey, Solicitor General, Gerald K. Robbins, Special Deputy Attorney General, Benjamin J. Kull, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Health and Human Services.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Plaintiff (Catawba County) on the 25th of April 2016 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th of May 2016 by Plaintiff (Catawba County) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 22nd of September 2016."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
